archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Charleston, West Virginia Account Book, February 23, 1885 - September 3, 1885
did.abstract: Collection consists of a ledger listing accounting information for an unidentified business located in the Charleston, West Virginia area.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Charleston, West Virginia Account Book must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Charleston, West Virginia Account Book, Ms2011-070, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Charleston, West Virginia Account Book was completed in August 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of accounting information for an unidentified business in the Charleston, West Virginia area. Entries date from February 23, 1885 through September 3, 1885.
The location of the business was inferred based upon entries within the ledger.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
